title: Qwen Chat for Desktop
author: Ankit Sharma
excerpt: QwQ-Max-Preview from Qwen is a powerful new LLM excelling in reasoning, math, coding, and agent tasks. Features a "thinking mode" for complex problems. Open-source coming soon!
